creator: cpile@snoogans.co.uk
text:
Just a very minor point to maintain consistency within the documentation. The Syntax line for AuthLDAPDereferenceAliases states all values in lower case, yet the Default line uses "Always" with a capital "A". Thanks, Chris. e.g. $ diff -Nurd mod_authnz_ldap.html.en mod_authnz_ldap.html.en.new --- mod_authnz_ldap.html.en Sun Nov 13 06:38:36 2005 +++ mod_authnz_ldap.html.en.new Sat Dec 24 10:07:55 2005 @@ -730,7 +730,7 @@ - + @@ -937,4 +937,4 @@

Copyright 1995-2005 The Apache Software Foundation or its licensors, as applicable.
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

Modules | Directives | FAQ | Glossary | Sitemap

- \ No newline at end of file +
Description:When will the module de-reference aliases
Syntax:AuthLDAPDereferenceAliases never|searching|finding|always
Default:AuthLDAPDereferenceAliases Always
Default:AuthLDAPDereferenceAliases always
Context:directory, .htaccess
Override:AuthConfig
Status:Extension
